app_name: Groups Treatment Groups Apple Translate Speak Translate Translator
app_description: Speak Translate Efficient Language Translator and Voice Interpreter for All Languages in the World. Perfect Voice Text Photo and Camera Translator app. Speak Translate is an innovative communication application that provides a unique way to translate and interpret all languages of the world. Speak and Translate is a free voice to voice translator for users who frequently need to translate one language into another. The app also can be used as an effective dictionary tool to find meanings of words of all languages in the world. By just simply speaking in your language the Speak and Translate Voice Translator will auto detect your language and will translate and interpret it into the desired language quickly. In short Speak Translate will convert your speech into text and can also be used as text to speech converter. All in all Speak and Translate mobile app is best to cater all your needs regarding voice translation language interpretation and dictionary. Speak and Translate Application is embedded with features that are excellent and accurate for Translation and Interpretation of All languages around the World. Here is a brief overview of Speak and Translate features: All Language Voice Translator The major feature of Speak and Translate application is it allows you to speak in any language and get the translation done in any other language. You simply have to speak in order to translate any language into another. For example if you need to Translate English into Hindi simply select English as your Input and Hindi as your output language. Now Speak and It will translate English to Hindi. Translate English into Any Other Language Speak and Translate application also works as English to All Language translator app. If you are to communicate with some non English speaking person then this application is best for you to communicate with nonnative English speaker. You simply speak in English and it will translate and speak into other language and will made communication easier between you two. Using this English to All Language Translator you can translate: English to French English to German English to Chinese English to Spanish English to Korean English to Japanese English to Arabic English to Hindi English to Tagalog English to Tamil English to Urdu English to Portuguese English to Russian English to Bangla All Languages Dictionary Speak and Translate is not just a simple voice to voice translator tool but also is an all language text and voice dictionary. Using its translator feature you can find meanings of any language of the world. The feature allows you to type the words or sentences and get the translation in the desired language.Supported Languages for Translation Interpretation: Afrikaans Albanian Arabic Armenian Azerbaijani Basque Belarusian Bengali Bosnian Bulgarian Catalan Cebuano Chichewa Chinese Simplified Chinese Traditional Croatian Czech Danish Dutch English Esperanto Estonian Filipino Finnish French Galician Georgian German Greek Gujarati Haitian Creole Hausa Hebrew Hindi Hmong Hungarian Icelandic Igbo Indonesian Irish Italian Japanese Javanese Kannada Kazakh Khmer Korean Lao Latin Latvian Lithuanian Macedonian Malagasy Malay Malayalam Maltese Maori Marathi Mongolian Myanmar Burmese Nepali Norwegian Persian Polish Portuguese Punjabi Romanian Russian Serbian Sesotho Sinhala Slovak Slovenian Somali Spanish Sundanese Swahili Swedish Tajik Tamil Telugu Thai Turkish Ukrainian Urdu Uzbek Vietnamese Welsh Yiddish Yoruba Zulu. SO install this All Language Voice to Voice Translator and Speak to Interpret any language of the World.
